titleStmt.title: C. C. Ball et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2766

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
To Hon. B. Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky

The undersigned Citizens of Madison County respectfully recommend to your Excellency the appointment of Stephen D. Walker as Justice of the Peace in District No 6 in this County to fill the vacancy occasioned by the removal of Cyrus B. Cook, late Justice, from said District --
Mr Walker is a good citizen & a man of high character & standing & would be very acceptable to the people of his District --

C C Ball
G E Billingsley
S K Turner
Tho. H. Barnes
C. F. Burnam
Wm. L. Neale
J. W Caperton
P P Ballard
Owen W. Walker
Brutus Crooke
Jas S. Walker
J. W. Crooke
H. H. Gibson
J W Barnes
James H. Embry
